dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, uh, does anyone actually care about these "Assembly of the People" things? Seriously?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, uh, does anyone actually care about these Assembly of the People things? Seriously?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, I mean, it's pretty significant, don't you think? President Tokayev himself convened it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, I mean, it's pretty significant, don't you think? President Tokayev himself convened it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: By order of the President, the regular session of the APK was convened. Head of State Kassym-Jomart Tokayev convened the regular XXXIV session of the Assembly of the People of Kazakhstan,

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right. The thirty-fourth one. Like, didn't they just have one?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right. The thirty-fourth one. Like, didn't they just have one?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Head of State Kassym-Jomart Tokayev convened the regular XXXIV session of the Assembly of the People of Kazakhstan,

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, the thirty-third was last year. But this is the next one, for 2025, in Astana.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, the thirty-third was last year. But this is the next one, for twenty twenty five, in Astana.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The session will be held on April 23-24, 2025 in Astana. The regular XXXIII† session with the agenda "Unity. Creation. Progress" was held in Astana on April 24-25, 2024.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, another year, another meeting. What, uh, what do they even do at these?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, another year, another meeting. What, uh, what do they even do at these?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's a consultative and advisory body, you know, uniting representatives from, like, all the nationalities.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's a consultative and advisory body, you know, uniting representatives from, like, all the nationalities.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Assembly of the People of Kazakhstan is a consultative and advisory body and unites representatives of all nations and nationalities living in the republic.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Consultative and advisory. Sounds very… official. And very much like a talking shop.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Consultative and advisory. Sounds very... official. And very much like a talking shop.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But it's about unity, isn't it? The last one's agenda was "Unity. Creation. Progress." That's a big deal.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But it's about unity, isn't it? The last one's agenda was Unity. Creation. Progress. That's a big deal.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The regular XXXIII† session with the agenda "Unity. Creation. Progress" was held in Astana on April 24-25, 2024.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Is it? Or is it just, um, words on a fancy program?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Is it? Or is it just, um, words on a fancy program?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, but think about it. Given the diverse population, having a body like this, where everyone's represented…
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, but think about it. Given the diverse population, having a body like this, where everyone's represented...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Represented to, uh, advise the president on what? To keep doing whatever he was gonna do anyway?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Represented to, uh, advise the president on what? To keep doing whatever he was gonna do anyway?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It provides a platform, though. For different groups to, like, voice their perspectives.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It provides a platform, though. For different groups to, like, voice their perspectives.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A platform that, what, meets once a year? For two days?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A platform that, what, meets once a year? For two days?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The session will be held on April 23-24, 2025 in Astana. ... The regular XXXIII† session ... was held in Astana on April 24-25, 2024.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Still, it's about building, um, national cohesion. Keeping the peace, keeping everyone together.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Still, it's about building, um, national cohesion. Keeping the peace, keeping everyone together.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Or just, you know, making it look like everyone's together. Whatever.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Or just, you know, making it look like everyone's together. Whatever.
